name: My Soldiers
description:
LET THE STORY BEGIN

My Soldiers places you in the role of a soldier who's new to a post near the border, you are gonna meet three soldiers here. So "My Soldiers" tells a story that happens in this small post with these guys. These guys have different personalities, There are 3 routes and over 100 CGs in all. Contains mature content, 18 and older only.

FEATURES

5 Full Long-form Routes
3 Main Characters
1 Secret Route
Over 200 full scene illustrations
36 Animated Hot Scenes
Hours of playing time, and steamy stories that are decided by your choices
Windows, Android Available
